original_text: Only the land of the priests bought he not; for the priests had a portion assigned them of Pharaoh, and did eat their portion which Pharaoh gave them: wherefore they sold not their lands.
korean_text: 제사장들의 토지는 사지 아니하였으니 제사장들은 바로에게서 녹을 받음이라 바로가 주는 녹을 먹으므로 그들이 토지를 팔지 않음이었더라

sentences.original_text: Only the land of the priests bought he not;
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 제사장들의 땅만은 그가 사지 않았으니

sentences.original_text: for the priests had a portion assigned them of Pharaoh,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 제사장들이 바로에게서 할당된 몫을 가졌기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: and did eat their portion which Pharaoh gave them:
wherefore they sold not their lands.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 자신들의 땅을 팔지 않았다
